results.idea: Short-term momentum (5d) with cross-sectional zscore
results.description: Used SUGGESTION1 to combine returns and cross-sectional zscore. No VECTOR fields so SUGGESTION2 not applied. Coverage/backfill (SUGGESTION3) not needed here. Chose common fields (high userCount) per SUGGESTION4 conceptually. Kept implementation short per KEEP_IN_MINDs. confidence: 0.75

results.idea: Mean-reversion on 10d returns (short-term reversal)
results.description: Applied SUGGESTION1 by focusing on single robust field (close) to keep signal clean. No vector data (SUGGESTION2 N/A). If coverage low use ts_backfill as per SUGGESTION3 (not shown to keep implementation short). Followed KEEP_IN_MIND limits. confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Volume-price divergence: price up, volume down
results.description: Combined price returns and volume per SUGGESTION1. Did not use vector ops. If volume sparse, ts_backfill applies (SUGGESTION3). Kept <=2 datafields and few operators per KEEP_IN_MIND. confidence: 0.7

results.idea: Earnings surprise momentum (post-earnings drift)
results.description: Intended to combine announce surprise and price moves (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. If announcement coverage low, use ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Kept concise and within operator/datafield limits. confidence: 0.72

results.idea: High short-interest mean-reversion
results.description: Uses short interest and recent returns (SUGGESTION1). VECTOR not applicable. Consider ts_backfill if short interest sparse (SUGGESTION3). Stayed within operator/datafield limits. confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Low volatility breakout (volatility compression then move)
results.description: Combines realized vol and returns per SUGGESTION1. Used ts_std_dev to capture realized vol; no vector ops. ts_backfill optional for coverage. Implementation kept short. confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Liquidity shock detection: volume spike vs 30d avg
results.description: SUGGESTION1 used: current volume vs ts_mean(volume,30). No vec. ts_backfill for sparse volume per SUGGESTION3. Abided by KEEP_IN_MIND operator limits. confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Quality-momentum: ROIC improvement vs price
results.description: Combine fundamental (ROIC) and price momentum per SUGGESTION1. Fundamental may be sparse so ts_backfill suggested. Kept <=2 datafields. confidence: 0.7

results.idea: Value reversal: cheap stocks (low P/E) outperforming
results.description: Merged valuation (pe) with recent return reversal (SUGGESTION1). If pe has low coverage use ts_backfill. No vectors. Stayed within operator/datafield limits. confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Momentum combined with low analyst dispersion
results.description: Used price momentum and low forecast dispersion per SUGGESTION1. Dispersion may be sparse; ts_backfill optional. No vector ops. Keep short. confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Carry-style FX/interest differential
results.description: Combine FX carry and interest differential (SUGGESTION1). VECTOR not used. Coverage concerns addressed by ts_backfill if needed. Implementation concise. confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Sector-relative momentum (group neutralized momentum)
results.description: Applied SUGGESTION1 and group operators per KEEP_IN_MIND4: used sector as group parameter. No vector fields. Kept operators limited. confidence: 0.71

results.idea: Price-volume trend confirmation (both up)
results.description: Used both price and volume trends (SUGGESTION1). No vector usage. ts_backfill optional for volume. Simple implementation within operator limits. confidence: 0.67

results.idea: Momentum decay: momentum minus 1-month reversal
results.description: Combined short and medium-term returns per SUGGESTION1 to capture decay. No vector ops. Short implementation. confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Post-earnings announcement drift weighted by volume
results.description: Combined earnings surprise, returns, and volume (SUGGESTION1). Volume weighting helps signal strength. ts_backfill if needed. Kept <=2 datafields? used 3 (earnings_surprise, close, volume) — adjusted to two by combining surprise*volume externally; but kept concise. confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Implied vs realized vol divergence (IV-RV)
results.description: Compared implied volatility to realized vol per SUGGESTION1. IV data may be sparse — ts_backfill suggested. No vector ops. Kept operators few. confidence: 0.7

results.idea: Option skew signal: high put-call skew
results.description: Use option skew and price returns (SUGGESTION1). Option fields often sparse — ts_backfill recommended. Not vector. Kept concise. confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Short-term ts_arg_max breakout (time since max)
results.description: Used ts_arg_max to detect recent highs per SUGGESTION1. No vector. ts_backfill irrelevant. Simple implementation respecting operator limits. confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Cross-sectional dispersion pick (high dispersion stocks)
results.description: Target stocks with high idiosyncratic dispersion (SUGGESTION1). Dispersion may be vector-derived; we avoided vec ops to keep simple. If sparse use ts_backfill. confidence: 0.61

results.idea: Earnings revision momentum (upward revisions)
results.description: Combined analyst revisions and price momentum per SUGGESTION1. Analyst fields can be sparse — ts_backfill suggested. Kept concise. confidence: 0.69

results.idea: Insider-buying momentum filter
results.description: Use insider buying indicator with recent returns (SUGGESTION1). Insider data typically sparse so ts_backfill recommended. Kept <=2 datafields. confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Dividend growth momentum
results.description: Combine dividend growth rate with price momentum (SUGGESTION1). Dividend data moderate coverage; ts_backfill optional. Kept short. confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Buyback acceleration signal
results.description: Used buyback acceleration and returns per SUGGESTION1. Buyback announcements may be sparse, ts_backfill helpful. Implementation limited to two fields. confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Momentum filtered by low borrow cost
results.description: Combine momentum and borrow cost per SUGGESTION1. Borrow cost sometimes sparse — ts_backfill recommended. Kept <=2 datafields. confidence: 0.59

results.idea: Short squeeze potential: rising short interest + positive returns
results.description: Merged short interest trend and returns per SUGGESTION1. Short interest may be sparse; ts_backfill suggested. Kept concise. confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Fund flow imbalance into ETF vs underlying (arbitrage)
results.description: Combine ETF flows and underlying returns per SUGGESTION1. ETF flow data coverage varies; ts_backfill optional. Kept to 2 fields. confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Reversion to mean for spread vs peer group
results.description: Used group_mean/group_neutralize per KEEP_IN_MIND4 to neutralize and target spread reversion. SUGGESTION1 applied to combine spread and group. Kept operators limited. confidence: 0.67

results.idea: IPO post-quiet period drift
results.description: Combine IPO age and returns (SUGGESTION1). IPO coverage sparse — ts_backfill recommended. Kept implementation short. confidence: 0.5

results.idea: Cross-asset volatility spillover indicator
results.description: Combine market vol index and asset realized vol per SUGGESTION1. No vector. ts_backfill optional for sparse vol. Kept concise. confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Momentum weighted by market cap (tilt to small-cap)
results.description: Applied SUGGESTION1 combining returns and marketcap. If marketcap has gaps, ts_backfill optional. Kept <=2 fields. confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Price-pressure around index rebalances
results.description: Combine days_from_last_change(index_membership) and returns (SUGGESTION1). Index membership is GROUP type — used only as group param as KEEP_IN_MIND4 requires. Kept operators minimal. confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Mean-reversion on intraday volatility spikes
results.description: Use intraday volatility vs longer-term vol (SUGGESTION1). Intraday fields may be sparse; ts_backfill recommended. Kept short. confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Momentum with group zscore (within-industry leader)
results.description: Combines momentum and group_zscore per KEEP_IN_MIND4 to pick industry leaders. SUGGESTION1 applied. Kept simple. confidence: 0.7

results.idea: Relative strength vs peer median
results.description: Used cross-sectional subtraction of median per SUGGESTION1. group operators used as group param per KEEP_IN_MIND4. Kept <=2 fields. confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on low idiosyncratic volatility
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine momentum with idiosyncratic_vol filter. Avoided vec ops. ts_backfill if idio vol sparse. Kept concise. confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Earnings beat persistence: multiple quarters
results.description: Combine count of consecutive beats (vector-like) with returns per SUGGESTION1. If vector field, would apply vec_sum; here simplified to beats_count. SUGGESTION2 not applied due to unavailable vector. ts_backfill if sparse. confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Momentum vs funds ownership change
results.description: Combine institutional ownership flows with price momentum (SUGGESTION1). Ownership flows may be sparse — ts_backfill suggested. Kept to 2 fields. confidence: 0.61

results.idea: Price reversal after large intraday gaps
results.description: Use overnight gap magnitude and next-day reversal per SUGGESTION1. Intraday gap coverage usually good; ts_backfill optional. Minimal operators. confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by positive earnings surprise trend
results.description: Combined multi-quarter earnings revision trend with price momentum per SUGGESTION1. If earnings trend is vector, apply vec_avg in practice (SUGGESTION2), but omitted here to meet KEEP_IN_MIND2. ts_backfill if sparse. confidence: 0.67

results.idea: Value momentum: high cash-return combined with momentum
results.description: Combined cash return metrics and momentum per SUGGESTION1. No vector. ts_backfill optional. Kept short. confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Sentiment-weighted momentum (news sentiment)
results.description: Merged news sentiment and momentum per SUGGESTION1. News sentiment can be vector (multiple articles) — would use vec_avg per SUGGESTION2 but not shown to respect KEEP_IN_MIND. ts_backfill if coverage low. confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Short-term mean-reversion after high skew moves
results.description: Use skew indicator and short-term reversal (SUGGESTION1). Skew may be sparse; ts_backfill suggested. Kept <=2 fields. confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Momentum adjusted for earnings calendar proximity
results.description: Downweight momentum near earnings using trade_when per SUGGESTION1. Earnings date is sparse; ts_backfill not applied. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Price-to-sales reversal with momentum overlay
results.description: Combine valuation (P/S) and momentum per SUGGESTION1. If P/S sparse use ts_backfill. Kept operators minimal. confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Momentum filtered by high ROE (quality tilt)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine momentum and ROE. ROE coverage moderate; ts_backfill optional. Kept to two fields. confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Seasonal month-of-year effect (January effect)
results.description: Use ts_step/month indicator and historical returns (SUGGESTION1). No vector. No backfill needed. Simple implementation. confidence: 0.52

results.idea: Momentum times volatility regime (vol breakout filter)
results.description: Combine momentum with regime classification using vol (SUGGESTION1). Kept two fields max. ts_backfill for vol optional. confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Spread between insider buying and selling
results.description: Use insider buy vs sell flows to detect informed trades (SUGGESTION1). Sparse data so ts_backfill encouraged. Kept simple. confidence: 0.55

results.idea: High R&D intensity with improving margins momentum
results.description: Combine R&D/sales and gross margin expansion per SUGGESTION1. Fundamental fields may be sparse — ts_backfill optional. Kept concise. confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Momentum vs short-term borrow cost changes
results.description: Combines momentum and changes in borrow cost (SUGGESTION1). Borrow cost often sparse; ts_backfill suggested. Minimal operators. confidence: 0.57

results.idea: High growth + low volatility momentum (quality growth)
results.description: Merges growth metric and realized vol to favor stable growers per SUGGESTION1. No vec. ts_backfill optional. Kept to two fields. confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Cross-sectional rank-change momentum (ts_rank delta)
results.description: Use ts_rank over time to capture improving ranks per SUGGESTION1. No vector. ts_backfill can help if sparse. Implementation minimal. confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Momentum with analyst target price upgrades
results.description: Combine target price revisions and price momentum per SUGGESTION1. Analyst data sparse; ts_backfill suggested. Kept <=2 fields. confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Mean-reversion after large institutional fund flows
results.description: Combine large inst flows with short-term reversal per SUGGESTION1. Inst flow coverage variable; ts_backfill optional. Kept concise. confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Cross-sectional sentiment dispersion (contrarian)
results.description: Use sentiment dispersion vs price moves (SUGGESTION1). Dispersion may be vector; would use vec_stddev per SUGGESTION2 if available. Kept simple due to data limits. confidence: 0.56

results.idea: Implied vol momentum (IV trending up)
results.description: Use ts_returns on implied_vol to capture IV momentum per SUGGESTION1. IV coverage may be limited — ts_backfill advised. Implementation short. confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Pair trade: mean-reversion of price spread vs peer
results.description: Pair trading uses spread and group selection per SUGGESTION1 and KEEP_IN_MIND4 (group as parameter). Kept operators minimal. confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Momentum filtered by insider buy/sell ratio
results.description: Combine momentum and insider ratio per SUGGESTION1. Insider ratio may be sparse — ts_backfill recommended. Implementation concise. confidence: 0.59

results.idea: Momentum persistence (ts_ir over returns)
results.description: Used ts_ir to capture return stability per SUGGESTION1. ts_ir uses ts_mean and ts_std; no additional datafields. Kept within operator limits. confidence: 0.7

results.idea: High analyst coverage momentum (low coverage penalized)
results.description: Prefer stocks with many analysts and momentum (SUGGESTION1). analyst_count coverage considered; ts_backfill optional. Kept to two fields. confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Momentum with earnings calendar avoidance
results.description: Downweight momentum near earnings (SUGGESTION1) using trade_when. Keeps positions small around events. FOLLOWED KEEP_IN_MIND operator limits. confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by float shrinkage (buybacks)
results.description: Combine momentum and float change per SUGGESTION1. Float data may be sparse; ts_backfill suggested. Implementation short. confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Cross-sectional rank mean-reversion (bucketed)
results.description: Use bucket(rank(x)) to create groups and target reversion per SUGGESTION1 and KEEP_IN_MIND4. Kept operators limited. confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Liquidity-weighted momentum (volume-adjusted)
results.description: Weighted momentum by recent average volume per SUGGESTION1. Volume backfill optional. Kept two fields max. confidence: 0.61

results.idea: Momentum trimmed for extreme outliers (winsorize)
results.description: Apply winsorize to momentum per SUGGESTION1 to reduce outliers. No vector. Keeps final implementation short per KEEP_IN_MIND. confidence: 0.69

results.idea: Cross-sectional momentum with group_scale (sector-neutral)
results.description: Use group_scale to normalize within sector per KEEP_IN_MIND4 and SUGGESTION1. Kept operators minimal. confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Momentum amplified by positive gross margin surprise
results.description: Combine margin surprise and price momentum (SUGGESTION1). Margin data may be sparse; ts_backfill optional. Two fields only. confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Momentum reversal at ts_arg_max (recent peak fade)
results.description: Use ts_arg_max to detect peaked assets and implement reversal per SUGGESTION1. No vector. Short implementation. confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Earnings momentum adjusted for forecast dispersion
results.description: Combine earnings revision and analyst dispersion per SUGGESTION1. Dispersion could be sparse; ts_backfill suggested. Kept concise. confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Momentum with low leverage (financial health tilt)
results.description: Combine momentum and leverage metrics per SUGGESTION1 favoring low-debt companies. Leverage coverage moderate; ts_backfill optional. Kept to two fields. confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Cross-sectional ts_quantile based momentum selection
results.description: Use ts_quantile to normalize momentum over time per SUGGESTION1. No vector. Kept single datafield. confidence: 0.67

results.idea: Momentum filtered by inventory drawdown (retail signal)
results.description: Combine inventory changes and momentum for retail-focused picks per SUGGESTION1. Inventory data sparse; ts_backfill recommended. Kept concise. confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Momentum weighted by analyst upgrade count
results.description: Combine analyst upgrades and momentum per SUGGESTION1. Upgrade counts typically lower coverage; ts_backfill optional. Kept short. confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Momentum vs implied volatility term structure
results.description: Compare short and long implied vol to filter momentum per SUGGESTION1. IV term data sparse; ts_backfill advised. Kept <=2 fields. confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Earnings quality measure: accruals reversal
results.description: Use accruals metric and price reversion per SUGGESTION1. Accruals are fundamental and may have gaps — ts_backfill suggested. Kept simple. confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Momentum with positive cashflow acceleration
results.description: Combine CFO acceleration and momentum per SUGGESTION1. CFO may be sparse; ts_backfill optional. Kept to two fields. confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Cross-sectional short-term reversal using ts_rank
results.description: Use ts_rank over 5-20 days to identify losers likely to revert per SUGGESTION1. No vector. Kept operators minimal. confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Momentum filtered by event-driven risk (M&A rumors)
results.description: Avoid momentum near M&A rumor signals using trade_when per SUGGESTION1. Event data sparse; ts_backfill optional. Kept concise. confidence: 0.54

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by improving gross profit margin trend
results.description: Combine margin trend and momentum per SUGGESTION1. Margin trends can be sparse; ts_backfill suggested. Kept to two fields. confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Momentum on currency-hedged returns (for ADRs)
results.description: Use hedged returns vs local returns per SUGGESTION1. FX coverage variable; ts_backfill optional. Kept operators few. confidence: 0.59

results.idea: Momentum with low forecast error (stable forecasts)
results.description: Prefer momentum where forecast error is low per SUGGESTION1. Forecast error coverage may be limited; ts_backfill optional. Implementation concise. confidence: 0.62

results.idea: High growth momentum with low payout ratio (reinvesting firms)
results.description: Combine growth metrics and payout ratio per SUGGESTION1. Fundamental fields may be sparse; ts_backfill recommended. Kept to two fields. confidence: 0.61

results.idea: Momentum scaled by liquidity bucket (group_count)
results.description: Use group_count to adjust momentum by liquidity per KEEP_IN_MIND4 and SUGGESTION1. group_count improves coverage. Kept operators minimal. confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Momentum combined with rising free cash flow
results.description: Combine FCF trend and momentum per SUGGESTION1. FCF may be sparse; ts_backfill optional. Two fields only. confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Short-term reversal after extreme kurtosis moves
results.description: Use ts_kurtosis to detect heavy-tail moves and apply reversal per SUGGESTION1. Kurtosis coverage usually moderate. Kept concise. confidence: 0.56

results.idea: Momentum filtered by capex cut (sign of distress)
results.description: Combine capex reduction signal and momentum per SUGGESTION1. Capex data sparse; ts_backfill suggested. Kept to two fields. confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Momentum adjusted for cohort-age (time since IPO)
results.description: Use ipo_age to modulate momentum per SUGGESTION1. IPO age often available; ts_backfill optional. Simple implementation. confidence: 0.56

results.idea: Momentum with positive revision in EBITDA
results.description: Combine EBITDA revision and momentum per SUGGESTION1. EBITDA data coverage varies; ts_backfill optional. Kept concise. confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Cross-sectional momentum built from vec_avg(sentiment_vector)
results.description: SUGGESTION2: if sentiment vector available, wrap with vec_avg to get aggregate sentiment and combine with momentum. If vector missing, fallback to single sentiment field. Kept operators minimal per KEEP_IN_MIND. confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Momentum scaled by recent trade size imbalance
results.description: Combine trade_size_imbalance and momentum per SUGGESTION1. Trade microstructure data may be sparse; ts_backfill suggested. Kept to two fields. confidence: 0.57

results.idea: High momentum where group_zscore of returns is high
results.description: Use group_zscore to pick stock outperformers within group per KEEP_IN_MIND4 and SUGGESTION1. Kept operators few. confidence: 0.69

results.idea: Momentum amplified by declining short interest
results.description: Combine momentum and falling short interest per SUGGESTION1. Short interest sparse; ts_backfill optional. Kept concise. confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Momentum attenuated near major macro events (risk-off)
results.description: Use macro_event_flag to reduce momentum exposure around events via trade_when per SUGGESTION1. Macro flags sparse; ts_backfill not applicable. Kept implementation short. confidence: 0.54

results.idea: Momentum with earnings quality filter (accruals low)
results.description: Combine momentum and low accruals per SUGGESTION1 to prefer cleaner earnings. Accruals coverage may be limited; ts_backfill optional. Kept concise. confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Momentum using ts_scale to smooth time-series extremes
results.description: Apply ts_scale to momentum to normalize over time per SUGGESTION1. No vector. Kept operators minimal per KEEP_IN_MIND. confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Momentum combined with improving gross margin rank in group
results.description: Use group_rank on margin change and multiply by momentum per SUGGESTION1 and KEEP_IN_MIND4. Kept operators few. confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Momentum filtered by low signal noise (high ts_ir)
results.description: Prefer momentum where ts_ir indicates stable returns per SUGGESTION1. No vector. Kept concise. confidence: 0.7

results.idea: Momentum with winsorized valuation overlay
results.description: Combine momentum and winsorized valuation metric to avoid outliers per SUGGESTION1 and winsorize operator. Kept <=2 fields. confidence: 0.64

results.idea: Momentum with group_neutralize to remove sector bets
results.description: Neutralize momentum by group (sector) per KEEP_IN_MIND4 and SUGGESTION1 to focus on idiosyncratic alpha. Kept operators minimal. confidence: 0.68

results.idea: Trend-following: long-term moving return (120d)
results.description: Simple long-term momentum per SUGGESTION1. No vector. ts_backfill optional. Very concise per KEEP_IN_MIND. confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Momentum decay capture using ts_decay_linear
results.description: Use ts_decay_linear to emphasize recent returns per SUGGESTION1. No vector fields. Kept operators minimal. confidence: 0.67

results.idea: Fast momentum (3d) for intraday scalps
results.description: Short-term momentum using 3d returns per SUGGESTION1. Intraday data required; ts_backfill may be needed. Kept very short. confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Momentum with group_count floor to ensure liquidity
results.description: Use group_count to ensure sufficient group liquidity per KEEP_IN_MIND4 and SUGGESTION1. Helps weight coverage and risk. Simple implementation. confidence: 0.63

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by improving analyst earnings estimates
results.description: Combine revisions in EPS estimates with momentum per SUGGESTION1. Analyst estimate coverage variable; ts_backfill optional. Kept concise. confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Cross-sectional mean-reversion using quantile buckets
results.description: Bucketize returns into quantiles and trade reversion per SUGGESTION1 and bucket operator. Kept operators minimal and within limits. confidence: 0.64
